body:
So, some of you may know I've been making resource packs starting around in "July 25th". Now I've done a 16x, 32x, 64x, And I want your suggestions, on what you want to see in my resource packs..
I am trying to make them LAG free (Doesnt mean any textures are edited such as stone). 

So if you want leave suggestions, on what you think everyone would like to see in a resource pack.

(e,g: Texture *this and that*). So that would be great, and if you have YOUR OWN resource pack, that you want me to use textures in, then you may suggest them in! :). But all I am looking to is what Avicus players want.  Also check out my friend's youtube channel. He makes videos, and occasional pack releases if you want some awesome packs! 
If you cant think of anything to suggest on, then you can vote on what you want to see:

     ♦ 16x16 resource pack 
     ♦ 16x16 Flared
     ♦ 32x32 resource pack
     ♦ 64x64 resource pack
     ♦ 128x128 resource pack
     ♦ 2048x2048 (Using SolidWorks Program at "SolidWorks.com") NOTE: Good CPU, Graphics Card, 16 - 24 GB's RAM. Good CPU Cooler!  ♦♦♦VIP REQUEST♦♦♦ 
     ♦ My choice :P 
Enjoy a Very Sunny day!!! ☼

title: [Max's Resource pack suggestions]
